website_summaries.verdict: While the Timeless is suitable for competitive bowlers, it's not practical for more casual enthusiasts of the sport or those who prefer a ball that's a bit easier to control.
pros: Made with the help of PBA champion Jason Belmonte to deliver fast-revving performance
Produces excellent drive with the right technique
cons: Not the best choice for novices, as the ball's powerful movements may be difficult for new bowlers to control
Doesn't perform very well on dry lanes

customer_reviews.title: Best Customer Service Ever
customer_reviews.text: My spouse bought one of these and before he could have it drilled, (or whatever you do to get those little holes in it) he tore his rotator cuff because he thinks he's indestructible and does stuff he shouldn't. We contacted the seller and they took it right back and gave us our money back. They were the nicest people ever. And he says he really loved the ball, even though he couldn't use it. So while I can't tell you whether or not the ball would have helped him finally bowl a 300 game, the seller is terrific and I wish they sold cat food. Because, well, cats.
customer_reviews.author: Not A Fake Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Ball Cracks
customer_reviews.text: This ball is trash. I ordered it mid bowling season 2017 and it cracked by year end. I thought it was bad luck and I liked the ball so I bought a new one after STORM refused to help me out and it cracked again. STORM doesn't care and I'm out $400
customer_reviews.author: Beave

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: Great ball. I bowl right handed with an average on about 180. Since I bought this ball, I have gone up about 10-15 pins. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Important
customer_reviews.text: Love the ball used it alot then went to get it it had a crack around the whole ball very sad good ball
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great ball even for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Great ball and works well on the oilier lanes where we regularly bowl. Got lots of compliments from the alley when I had it drilled. I throw a straight ball and very recently figured out how to do a decent hook with this ball throwing it straight. Excited to see what it does for my average.
customer_reviews.author: VGVa

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this ball because they sent me a code red not timeless
customer_reviews.text: I didn't open the package till i was at the pro-shop to get it drilled, then i noticed it was a code red instead of a timeless. but since i was there i had it drilled. Man does the code red Hook...Pretty hard to control the ball finishes very hard..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Power is 16 lb !!
customer_reviews.text: I just moved up to this 16 lb ball. I am amazed how much better I improved. Was bowling 175 avg. and after bowling for a few days I am bowling over 200 now!! The power of a 16 lb just blows the pins out. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth B.

customer_reviews.title: Not really good as a first time ball
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. A lot of ball movement. Not really good as a first time ball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the movement this ball has at the end of ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the movement this ball has at the end of the lane. Just what I needed to improve my game.
customer_reviews.author: corderm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend love this ball,its the best,thank you guys for your fast deliver and wonderful profuct.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: This ball grabs tight even in the oil...Smells good too.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This bowling ball is fantastic, my average is up 15 pins and it's consistency is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Bagman

customer_reviews.title: This bowling ball is amazing. Previous bowled with a Hammer Black Widow Series ...
customer_reviews.text: This bowling ball is amazing. Previous bowled with a Hammer Black Widow Series ball which was not giving me the hook and action with the Pins. After using this ball i was able to see a dramatic increase in my pin action and consistent hook. Within using the ball the first 2 months, i was bowled my highest game ever (279) and have been able to maintain a higher average (+20 pins) compared to my previous ball.
customer_reviews.author: Wyocowboy

customer_reviews.title: Maybe this ball would react better and have more consistency if the coverstock was pearl
customer_reviews.text: Does not read the lane well, needs to be thrown up the middle to be able to push through without breaking to early. Honestly wish I went with the hammer gold legend. Maybe this ball would react better and have more consistency if the coverstock was pearl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid ball
customer_reviews.text: Really nice ball. Nice controllable hook. Not to mention a pleasing smell on the ball
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great delivery time. The storm bowling ball hooks strong into the pocket! Increasing my average.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Bowling Ball
customer_reviews.text: Love this Bowling Ball! It is way above my expertise, but it is fun to play with and see how I can make it curve and turn! I have 4 Storm Balls and a Hammer and this is my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn D

customer_reviews.title: Great ball.
customer_reviews.text: Still pretty new to bowling, one had one ball ever. My first time out with the ball, posted my highest game ever 282. I was blown away with the results. I still need to work on other skill set with my game, having a great ball sure helps. Moe
customer_reviews.author: Maurice E. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Works well on lots of oil
customer_reviews.text: Ball hooks a lot, great ball for advanced players. Definitely not a beginner ball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ♡♡♡
customer_reviews.text: It got here in time for my daughters birthday and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 7 Strikes! Luv this ball!
customer_reviews.text: Gr8 price & awesome bowling ball. Love it! First game played with it, 7 strikes in a row!!
customer_reviews.author: Garrett&Kim

customer_reviews.title: A Monster!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's birthday. I can't review it for my own use, but I can repeat what h has said. He has said it is one of the sharpest and accurate balls he has used in a long time. He also said there is somewhat of a learning curve to it, just as there is to any ball. Finally, he said the ball is amazing and when everything is lined up just right, it's a monster and just flies.
customer_reviews.author: AmyNoelle

customer_reviews.title: Outside of looking good, the ball performed great and enabled me to ...
customer_reviews.text: Outside of looking good , the ball performed great and enabled me to bowl several very high games with ease .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Cover stock isn't holding up very well
customer_reviews.text: The cover stock is getting deeply scratched and gouged after about 10 games. I keep it in a bowling bag and always wash it after each time I bowl. This ball seems over priced at almost $300.
customer_reviews.author: DeltaTech

customer_reviews.title: Hitting the pocket was easy, throw right and only hit the 1-3 pins
customer_reviews.text: Hitting the pocket was easy, throw right and only hit the 1-3 pins. Has the perfect drive. My league average has went up from a 226 to a 233. Love this ball!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Max Hollmann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This ball is definitely one of the best ball that i have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Storm Timeless Bowling Ball- Blue/Platinum/Black
product_meta.description: A revolutionary ball in collaboration with Jason Belmonte the reigning three-time PBA Player of the Year. Timeless is the first release in our all-new Signature Line, an unprecedented and versatile series focusing on one-of-a-kind products. The Timeless features the unparalleled Dual-Drive weight block and superior R2S coverstock. The combination of these unique attributes gives the ball a fast-revving benefit like the !Q Tour with the hitting power of the Hy-Road. The inception of the Dual-Drive was born of a sprawling development process that has spanned years. This could not be achieved without placing a weight block of specific size and shape inside of another weight block. The outer weight block incorporates strategically placed geometric shapes that, in conjunction with the inner weight block, establishes a new standard in bowling ball motion – faster revving action with a higher level of energy transfer at the pins. Color: Blue Solid/Platinum Pearl/Black Pearl Core: Dual-Drive (14-16lbs) Coverstock: R2S Hybrid Reactive Finish: 1500-grit Polished RG: 2.57 (15lb ball) Differential: 0.050 (15# ball) Recommended Lane Condition: Medium-Heavy Oil Fragrance: Aromatherapy - Citrus
feature_bullets: A revolutionary ball in collaboration with Jason Belmont the reigning three time pba player of the year
Timeless bowling ball is the first release in our new signature line
The ball Comes with an aromatherapy fragrance which is quite popular for Storm bowling balls
